title: IS_PED_USING_ACTION_MODE
content:
0x5AE7EDA2// IsPedUsingActionMode
bool IS_PED_USING_ACTION_MODE(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The target ped.Returns: Whether or not the ped is using action mode.
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for IS_PED_USING_ACTION_MODE
IsPedUsingActionMode(ped)
